summary: Diff updates the specified frontend utilities to use harsher, legal-accountability messaging: new/updated templates in messageGenerator.ts for firm/severe/very harsh; expanded postLoginSplashMessages.ts while preserving the four required exact lines; and revised generateEvidenceSummary.ts urgent/urgent-feminine copy (no visible use of the word "threat" in the provided truncated portion). No clear unrequested features are evident from the diff summary.
